com.irurueta.geometry.estimators.LineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator

Packages that use LineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator
Package
Description
com.irurueta.geometry.estimators
This package contains classes to estimate basic geometric structures

  • Uses of LineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator in com.irurueta.geometry.estimators

    Subclasses of LineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator in com.irurueta.geometry.estimators
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LMedSLineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 2D transformation for provided collections of matched 2D lines using LMedS algorithm.
    class 
    MSACLineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 2D transformation for provided collections of matched 2D lines using MSAC algorithm.
    class 
    PROMedSLineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 2D transformation for provided collections of matched 2D lines using PROMedS algorithm.
    class 
    PROSACLineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 2D transformation for provided collections of matched 2D lines using PROSAC algorithm.
    class 
    RANSACLineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 2D transformation for provided collections of matched 2D lines using RANSAC algorithm.

    static LineCorrespondenceAffineTransformation2DRobustEstimator
